overview: Unperturbed by the disastrous outcome of his previous meddling with the dead, Dr. West continues his research into the phenomenon of re-animation; only this time, he plans to create life – starting with the heart of his young protégé Dan's dearly deceased, Meg Halsey. Surely nothing could go wrong?
cast: Jeffrey Combs|Bruce Abbott|Claude Earl Jones|Fabiana Udenio|David Gale
